value.stringValue: Consists of a Subscription that grants a number of Credits, and a Usage tracker that bills for Overage.
Pay in pre-defined instalments or leave open-ended for greater flexibility.
One-off sale. You can pay in instalments by choosing "Invoice Plan" for the Billing Frequency.
Accumulates usage from multiple Standard usage products
Tracks consumption for one or more units of measure (separately)

fields.name: Message
fields.fieldText: The wizard for this charge model is not yet available. Keep an eye out for updates to the package.
